column1: 1409563153 54043a140d0cee61526e8b57 566613 2408901 427 "Dee Paul" https://www.zomato.com/users/dee-paul-566613 "Nothing can be better than being in Ice lounge in delhis scorching heat in the months of May and June. The Ice lounge is located in the otherwise a dull mall Metropolitan but situated next to Delhis most popular mall Select city walk. They opened up apprx 4 odd years back and i have been going there regularly. There is a restaurant before the ice area where one can eat and dine nicely before and after the ice lounge experience. Before entering the ice lounge
column2: one is given heavy jackets and a complete gear to survive in sub zero temperature bur still it becomes difficult to sit inside in i guess minus eighteen degrees for a very long time. There are interesting and beautiful ice sculptures inside which makes the place even more interesting. The drinks are served in glasses made of ice . Its an excellent experience to be there. A must visit. We had Non vegetarian platter which is a mix of Chicken

column2: Ice glasses
column3: Ice floor
column4: Ice walls""I have been to Ice Lounge twice and the experience was of awesomeness both time..when you are pissed out of never ending summers and feel to be in refrigerator then you should come here.Everything is so chilled here.The decor is so mind boggling.However the interior will remind you of movie Namesty London.But its not that big in volume but managed well by staff.What i ordered here was Crisp Honey Chilly Potatoes(not too crispy) with Vodka with Orange juice that came in shape of Cube glass made up of Ice. You will have a awesome time here.But due to temperature your body will demand you to get out of this place as the temperature is in some minus degrees.(i dont remember the exact number the bar tender told me).Apparently you will feel it a bit expensive but the Ice inside the lounge will make you Chillaxx..For me its one of my favorites in Delhi." 2750 "2014-03-21 17:32:04" 34 Excellent https://www.zomato.com/review/PeDZG 5 1395403324.0
